uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.exec

Interface DeferredProcessProxy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProcessProxy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProcessHandler

    public interface DeferredProcessProxy
extends ProcessProxy
    A ProcessProxy with deferred execution. The process is not actually started till the execute(long) method is called.
    Author:
    spb
     

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      wait for the process to complete.

      void setTimeout(long timeout_millis)
      Set an automatic timeout for the DeferredProcessProxy implemented by a thread.
      void start()
      Start the deferred process

      • setTimeout

        void setTimeout(long timeout_millis)
        Set an automatic timeout for the DeferredProcessProxy implemented by a thread. This can be used if the spawning thread is not going to wait for completion.
        Parameters:
        timeout_millis -
